EmailTemplate.name: Contract Term Date < 14 Days
EmailTemplate.subject: {!LVGO__Contract__c.Name} will expire in 14 Days
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!LVGO__Contract__c.LVGO__CSM__c} ,
Your Contract {!LVGO__Contract__c.Name} is set to expire in two weeks. Please contact Legal to adjust accordingly before the expiration date.
